mapper.insert: insert into RESERVATION (reservation_name, email, tel, total_price, reserve_date, reserve_start_time, reserve_end_time) values (#{reservation_name}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{total_price}, #{reserve_date}, #{reserve_start_time}, #{reserve_end_time})
mapper.select: select id, venue_name, reserve_date, paydate, total_price, status from RESERVATION where 1 = 1
